member.name: T:NAudio4Maui.AudioOut
member.summary: Represents an Android wave player implemented using .

member.summary: Gets or sets the volume in % (0.0 to 1.0).

member.summary: Gets or sets the desired latency in milliseconds.

member.name: P:NAudio4Maui.AudioOut.NumberOfBuffers
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of buffers to use.

member.summary: Gets or sets the content type.

member.summary: Gets or sets the performance mode.

member.summary: Occurs when the player has stopped.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes the player with the specified wave provider.

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
